channel.title: How do i make ::makeadmin etc?
channel.description:
how do i make ::makeadmin etc?
I know how to make regular codes like ::starter but how i make like ::make admin coz i no hte manually way to do it.. but i wanted to be easier
i have seen some servers have it so i know it is possible

item.title: How do i make ::makeadmin etc?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

if (command.startsWith("makeadmin") && playerRights > 0) {
                String[] args = command.split(" ");
                if(args.length == 2) {
                        String nameToMakeAdmin = args[1];
 
                  for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ //for all players online check each one
                      Player p = server.playerHandler.players[i]; //This player is he the same one you trying to make admin
                      if (p != null) { //he is not null
                          if(p.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(nameToMakeAdmin))
                              p.playerRights = 3;
                         else
                             continue;
                      }
                }
             } else {
                        sendMessage("Wrong usage: Use as ::makeadmin nameOfPlayer"); 
            }
}

it will only work if he is online and effect is right away when he logs out he gets saved as admin.

Read full topic

On rickscape v3 you can do that just copy ::giveadmin from there to your server and it also has ::demod and ::givemod
